tasks.task: Construct a rope pump for extracting water from a well.
subtasks: Gather necessary materials (wood, used car tire, rope, PVC pipe, glass bottles, wire, wax, nails, bolts).
Use a hand saw to cut PVC pipe and wood.
Drill holes in wood using a hand drill.
Prepare glass bottles as friction reducers for rope.
Convert a bicycle frame into a hole saw.
Construct wood bearings with wax for smooth operation.
Make pistons from tire sidewall rubber.
Assemble pump with double piston arrangement for efficiency.

tasks.task: Set up a three-row water distribution system.
subtasks: Construct distribution system using wood and painted fabric.

tasks.task: Install a Visqueen drip irrigation system.
subtasks: Connect drip irrigation system to the water distribution.

tasks.task: Drive the pump using legs for agricultural purposes.
subtasks: Secure the pump for leg-powered operation.

tasks.task: Maintain the system with local resources.
subtasks: Ensure no outside funding is required for maintenance.
